description: After Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann had been destroyed by the Granzeboma, Team Dai-Gurren split its power into pieces to form their own separate Tengen Toppa Gunmen, including Tengen Toppa Lagann`s head becoming Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. The rest of said team was composed of a Tengen Toppa Gunmen for all surviving members, as well as Nia. After a lengthy battle, Lordgenome sacrificed himself to absorb the Anti-Spiral`s Infinity Big Bang Storm and create a mass of Spiral Power, which Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann absorbed and combined into the Super Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. It only appears in the second movie, and never appeared in the original television series.
name: Super Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
